home.title: Welcome to the Moon Solo Helper
home.play1: Play Welcome to the Moon against ASTRA, the Solo opponent.
home.play2: This application simulates the starship deck and counts ASTRAs points depending on mission and level. The special rules for the campaign(s) are supported.

campaignOptions.title: Campaign Options
campaignOptions.intro: The listed events are exclusively for the selected mission. The other options activated during the campaign may span over multiple missions and are displayed for every mission.

event-card.title: Events
event-card.option: Mission #{mission}: Add event card {value}. | Mission #{mission}: Add event cards {value}.

block-cards.title: Blocked Starship Cards
block-cards.optionBlockValue: Take 6 starship cards out of the game: Remove all starship cards with value {value}. | Take 6 starship cards out of the game: Remove all starship cards with values {value}.
block-cards.optionBlockAction: Take 6 starship cards out of the game: Randomly remove {count1} {action1} cards and {count2} {action2} cards.

turn.title: Turn {turn}
turn.accomplishMission: Flip mission card {value} to accomplished side

gameOver.title: Game over
gameOver.info: Game over - tally up your points.

mission8.plantWater: Plant or Water action: Cross off a corresponding symbol still available on the planet.
mission8.planningAstronaut: Planning or Astronaut action: Draw the ASTRA insignia in a space still available on the moon.
mission8.robotEnergy: Robot or Energy action: Draw the ASTRA insignia on an asteroid starting on the opposite side of the sheet.
mission8.robotEnergyNoBenefit: ASTRA does not benefit from the Bonus symbols of the asteroids.

action.endGameConfirm: End this game and return to home screen - are you sure?
